title: @Meddler: Why can we see Skaarl's tracks in the dirt?
body: And does it relate to Warwick's rework at all?

replies.body: The team working on Kled thought footstops from Skaarl would be a nice little touch aesthetically so they added them since they had a little bit of extra time.
I see, thank you.  I was hoping it'd be a hint towards some tracking mechanic that Warwick might use, sadly that does not seem to be the case.

I really like the little stuff like this man. THe big picture is great, but the smallest details really brings the game to life. Keep it up.

Edit: Fix Shen bro...... please man Either you or reaver must step up and take responsibility and fix him. He was my favourite champion and now I cannot even look at him without cringing at his passive. 

He is a ninja not a shaman ....
